Description: Limestone trial-piece: on face marked with grid in red with black-painted representation of baboon beneath a funerary bed; on the other face a red-painted representation of a standing anthropomorphic figure.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2013, Apr - Jul, Paris, Louvre, L'Art Du Contour 2013/2014, Sept - Jan, Musée royaux d’art et d’histoire, Brussels, L'Art Du Contour
